content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 200 Euros, but I am open to negotiation. I am also very dependable and responsible, so I believe I would be a good fit for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Max. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on the size of the apartment and the location, I was thinking a monthly rental of 250 Euros would be fair. However, I am open to considering your budget and would be happy to discuss any potential concessions. Would you be willing to consider a rental price of 250 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I can accept that price. I agree to the price of 250 Euros. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the agreement?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Great, Max. I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement. Before we finalize the agreement, I would like to clarify a few things. Is this a short-term or long-term rental? Additionally, do you have any pets or plan to have any pets in the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine
